structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

law.text: Any official who is authorized to certify to facts on the basis of records in his custody is authorized to certify to facts on the basis of records that have been transferred by him or his predecessors to the department, further provided, that any fee due any official of the state or its subdivisions shall not be eliminated by KRS 171.410 to 171.740.
law.history: Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 55. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 30, effective June 19, 1958.
